description.value:
Your summoning conjures forth a brief look at the true form of an astral or god. The eidolon occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. All conditions inflicted by eidolons last for 3 rounds.

  • Ifrit Arrive (fire, healing) Healing Light All allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] of Ifrit heal @Damage[5d8[healing]] hit points, and may make another check against any persistent fire effects they are suffering from; Depart (fire) Hellfire Ifrit departs in a blaze of glory, dealing @Damage[5d10[fire]] damage to all enemies in a @Template[type:line|distance:120], with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. Each enemy that critically fails also takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]] damage.
  • Shiva Arrive (sleep) Mesmerize All enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] of Shiva must make a @Check[will|against:spell] save or suffer the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{@Localize[AIE.SpellNames.1st.Sleep]} spell heightened to 4th rank; Depart (ice) Diamond Dust Shiva departs with a crashing sound of shattering glass. All enemies in a @Template[type:cone|distance:100] take @Damage[5d10[cold]] damage, with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save. Those who critically fail are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.
  • Ramuh Arrive (paralyze) Mind Blast Ramuh arrives in a burst of lightning, blinding any creature within a @Template[type:burst|distance:50] centered on Ramuh unless they succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save; Depart (lightning) Judgment Bolt Ramuh departs with a peal of thunder. All enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] of Ramuh take @Damage[5d10[electricity]] damage with a @Check[will|against:spell|basic] save. Any creature that critically fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
  • Leviathan Arrive (incapacitation) Demon Eye One target of your choice within 60 feet of Leviathan must make a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save. On a failed save, they begin to petrify, as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{@Localize[AIE.SpellNames.6th.Petrify]} spell; Depart (water) Tidal Wave Leviathan departs in a rushing wave. All enemies in a @Template[type:cone|distance:100] take @Damage[5d10[water-ff]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. Any creature that critically fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.spell-effects.Item.4yehAKiytVsX1dtL]{Drenched} for 1 minute.

  • Titan Arrive (earth) Earth Wall While within 100 feet of Titan, you and your allies gain resistance 20 against fire, lightning, and wind; Depart (earth) Earthen Fury Titan departs with a powerful tremor. All enemies in a @Template[type:cone|distance:100] take @Damage[5d10[earth-ff]] damage with a @Check[will|against:spell|basic] save. Any creature that critically fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}.
    @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.spell-effects.Item.aYEzC7Li67e0EHyK]{Spell Effect: Summon Eidolon (Earth Wall)}

  • Garuda Arrive (wind) Aerial Armor You and each ally within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} of Garuda are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} while Garuda is present, and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; Depart (wind) Aerial Blast Garuda departs in a raging windstorm. All enemies in a @Template[type:line|distance:120] take @Damage[5d10[wind-ff]] damage, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. Any creature that critically fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.
  • Odin Arrive (unaspected) Protective Light While within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} of Odin, you and your allies gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9igi8LcrNQKwljK7]{@Localize[AIE.SpellNames.7th.SpellRiposte]} spell; Depart (death, incapacitation, unaspected) Zantetsuken All enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] of Odin must make a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save. A creature that fails takes @Damage[5d10[slashing]] damage, while a creature that critically fails is instantly reduced to 0 Hit Points.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
